game.s_dis: Atari Anniversary Advance is a 2002 GBA collection featuring six classic Atari arcade games — Asteroids, Battlezone, Centipede, Missile Command, Super Breakout, and Tempest — recreated faithfully for handheld play.
game.l_dis:
Play Atari Anniversary Advance GBA Online – Classic Arcade Collection

Atari Anniversary Advance brings six of the most iconic arcade classics to the Game Boy Advance. Experience the timeless gameplay of Asteroids, Battlezone, Centipede, Missile Command, Super Breakout, and Tempest — all faithfully recreated for portable gaming.

What is Atari Anniversary Advance?

Atari Anniversary Advance is a 2002 compilation that captures the original arcade experience with authentic graphics, gameplay, and sound. Each game retains its original mechanics while adding GBA-exclusive features like high-score saving, multiplayer modes, and an Atari Trivia Challenge for fans of gaming history.

Games Included

  • Asteroids: Pilot your ship through space, destroying asteroids and flying saucers.
  • Battlezone: Command a tank in a 3D wireframe battlefield.
  • Centipede: Blast through waves of insects in this shooter classic.
  • Missile Command: Defend cities from incoming missiles using strategic aim.
  • Super Breakout: Smash blocks with your bouncing ball for high scores.
  • Tempest: Spin through psychedelic vector tunnels shooting enemies.

How to Play Atari Anniversary Advance

  • Select a Game: Choose from six classic titles on the main menu.
  • Use GBA Controls: Adapt the simple arcade controls to handheld buttons.
  • Compete for Scores: Save and challenge your best runs.
  • Play with Friends: Some titles support two-player link cable modes.

Why Play Atari Anniversary Advance Online?

Play Atari Anniversary Advance unblocked in your browser and enjoy authentic retro arcade fun. Relive six timeless classics without the need for emulators or downloads — all free and accessible online.

Key Features

  • Six Legendary Games: Includes Asteroids, Centipede, and more.
  • Arcade-Perfect Gameplay: Authentic visuals and sounds from the originals.
  • Multiplayer Options: Compete or cooperate via link cable.
  • Atari Trivia Challenge: Test your retro gaming knowledge.
  • Portable Retro Action: Perfect for short play sessions or nostalgia trips.

Relive the Golden Age of Gaming!

Step into gaming history with Atari Anniversary Advance — a perfect tribute to the golden age of arcade games. Play online now and see how it all began!
